channel.title: [audio issue] While in vents glock reload sound is cut off
channel.description: Hey all! I've been waiting for this mod for about 5 years now and love it so far! One problem I have encountered is while in vents the glock reload sound is cutoff. It has the clip out sound but it gets cut off there and no clip in sound is played at all.

item.title: [audio issue] While in vents glock reload sound is cut off
item.dc:creator: ciorex
item.description:
Got that aswell, the empty.wav doesn’t play.

Read full topic

item.title: [audio issue] While in vents glock reload sound is cut off
item.dc:creator: Deathisnear24
item.description:
Hey all! I’ve been waiting for this mod for about 5 years now and love it so far! One problem I have encountered is while in vents the glock reload sound is cutoff. It has the clip out sound but it gets cut off there and no clip in sound is played at all.
